title: Privacy Policy

intro.paragraph: This Privacy Notice for SeaNeB Technologies Private Limited (doing business as SeaNeB) ('we', 'us', or 'our'), describes how and why we might access, collect, store, use, and/or share ('process') your personal information when you use our services ('Services'), including when you:
points: Download and use our mobile application (SeaNeB), or any other application of ours that links to this Privacy Notice
Engage with us in other related ways, including any sales, marketing, or events
intro.contactNote: Questions or concerns? Reading this Privacy Notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices. We are responsible for making decisions about how your personal information is processed. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services. If you still have any questions or concerns, please contact us at hello@seaneb.com.

summaryPoints.label: What personal information do we process?
summaryPoints.text: When you visit, use, or navigate our Services, we may process personal information depending on how you interact with us and the Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use.

summaryPoints.label: Do we process any sensitive personal information?
summaryPoints.text: Some of the information may be considered 'special' or 'sensitive' in certain jurisdictions, for example your racial or ethnic origins, sexual orientation, and religious beliefs. We do not process sensitive personal information.

summaryPoints.label: Do we collect any information from third parties?
summaryPoints.text: We do not collect any information from third parties.

summaryPoints.label: How do we process your information?
summaryPoints.text: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent. We process your information only when we have a valid legal reason to do so.

summaryPoints.label: In what situations and with which parties do we share personal information?
summaryPoints.text: We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties.
